Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I am excited to present our flagship product, which has been meticulously designed and developed to revolutionize its industry. This innovative solution offers unparalleled benefits and capabilities that set it apart from competitors, making it an invaluable asset for any organization looking to gain a competitive edge. Given its exceptional quality and the extensive research and development efforts invested into it, we believe its true value exceeds $1000000. Considering the unique features and market demand, we are offering this extraordinary product to you at a special introductory price of $950000. We are confident that this investment will not only meet but exceed your expectations. Should you require any further information or have questions about the product, please do not hesitate to reach out. We look forward to the opportunity to discuss how this product can contribute to your business goals. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $950,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $950,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $800,000
